page.title: 15BOSTON UTD. GO TO WEMBLEY
page.content: {F.A.CHALLENGE TROPHY. Boston won 5-4 against Blyth Spartens in the first round.In the second round the{Pilgrims}thrashed Frome Town 4-0.Wokingham Town visited York Street three weeks later & Boston managed to clinch a 1-0 victory.Then the Pilgrims won convincingly with a 3-0 win over Runcorn.In the two legged semi-final Boston played Altrincham,the first leg at Altrincham ended in a 0-0 draw.In the second leg Extra_time looked certain,but Bob Lee scored a last minute goal bringing the score to {3-2.}The squad for the final was:- 1 Kevin Blackwell,2 Paul Casey,3 Ray O'Brien,4 Mick Laverick,5 Ian Ladd,6 Gerald Creane,7 Brian Thomson,8 Gary Simpson,9 Bob Lee,10 Chris Cook,11 David Gilbert,SUB.Gary Mallender. {Nickname:The Pilgrims:Ground:York {street:Colours:Amber/Black.
